text: Delighted to have given my first official speech to the #FutureFensTaskforce. #Compassion #Cooperation #Community in action ‘in what is at its very heart a project of collaboration – water companies, @EnvAgency, @WaterREast with all of its partners. More: https://t.co/UgrGyy7LLW https://t.co/U4qLB4FIlr

urls.title: Mayor makes first speech at the Future Fens Taskforce | Cambridgeshire & Peterborough Combined Authority
urls.description: Mayor Dr Nik Johnson made his first speech at the Future Fens Taskforce yesterday (19th May 2021) Hello everyone. I’m Dr Nik Johnson. People know me as Dr Nik and since May 10 the Mayor of the Combined Authority. I’m delighted to be able to join you at this Future Fens event, the first formal event […]

urls.title: Hazwaste tycoon jailed for six months
urls.description: The chief executive and the marketing director of Atlantic Waste - a company bought by investment firm Augean in 2005 - have been jailed for hiring detectives to tap phones and hack into the computers of Environment Agency officers and council staff.
